# EKSourceType

**Enumeration**

The type of source object.

## Declaration

```swift
enum EKSourceType
```

## Overview

The [doc://com.apple.eventkit/documentation/EventKit/EKSource/sourceType] property will be set to one of these values.

## EventKit Source Types

- **EKSourceType.local**: Represents a local source.
- **EKSourceType.exchange**: Represents an Exchange source.
- **EKSourceType.calDAV**: Represents a CalDAV or iCloud source.
- **EKSourceType.mobileMe**: Represents a MobileMe source.
- **EKSourceType.subscribed**: Represents a subscribed source.
- **EKSourceType.birthdays**: Represents a birthday source.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Accessing Source Properties

- **sourceIdentifier**: A unique identifier for the source object.
- **sourceType**: The type of this source object.
- **title**: The name of this source object.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
